infos.value: Hmph. These Fennes soldiers are nothing to fear.
So this is the strength of Hourne's first division, «Solidus»...
How should we deal with them?
I don't think we can hold them off forever...
You bastard. How dare you show your face after what you've done.
I prefer the company of strong people. Don't take it personally.
Hmph. She needn't be here when I can deal with the likes of you by myself.
Ha. Well, he's certainly taking us lightly. In that case...
May you rot in hell for your crimes!
Do you really think you can best all of these Fennes soldiers?
Oh, come on... Surely you don't intend to—
Not so bold now, are we?
We shan't go easy on you just because you're on your own.
Oh, give me a break! I'm not going to wait around to get killed!
(...That's right, come after me. I shall show you the hell you condemn me to. Heh heh heh.)
Vistralle is attempting to flee, with «Solidus» advancing in pursuit!
...They are walking right into a trap.
